md:
giải nghĩa từ "lloyd" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Lloyd (noun)
	* Meaning: a person who is a member of a noble or aristocratic family
	* Vietnamese: quý tộc, quý ông
	* Example: "The Lloyd family has a long history of wealth and power."
	* Related words: aristocrat, noble, gentleman

2. Lloyd (proper noun)
	* Meaning: a surname of Welsh origin
	* Vietnamese: họ Lloyd
	* Example: "David Lloyd George was a British politician."
	* Related words: surname, family name, Welsh

3. Lloyd's (proper noun)
	* Meaning: a British insurance market
	* Vietnamese: thị trường bảo hiểm Lloyd's
	* Example: "Lloyd's of London is one of the oldest insurance markets in the world."
	* Related words: insurance, market, London
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lloyd" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Lloyd (noun)

    • Meaning: a person who is a member of a noble or aristocratic family
    • Vietnamese: quý tộc, quý ông
    • Example: "The Lloyd family has a long history of wealth and power."
    • Related words: aristocrat, noble, gentleman

  2. Lloyd (proper noun)

    • Meaning: a surname of Welsh origin
    • Vietnamese: họ Lloyd
    • Example: "David Lloyd George was a British politician."
    • Related words: surname, family name, Welsh

  3. Lloyd's (proper noun)

    • Meaning: a British insurance market
    • Vietnamese: thị trường bảo hiểm Lloyd's
    • Example: "Lloyd's of London is one of the oldest insurance markets in the world."
    • Related words: insurance, market, London
